<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Acrobatic Performer](/Feats.aspx?ID=6458) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 226 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34)

</column>

---

You're an incredible acrobat, evoking wonder and enrapturing audiences with your prowess. You can roll an Acrobatics check instead of a [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) check when using the [Perform](/Actions.aspx?ID=2401) action. If you are trained in both Acrobatics and Performance, you gain a +1 circumstances bonus on Acrobatics checks made to Perform.
name: Acrobatic Performer
